BH/BlastRage


BH:sees all the bullets heading towards the skimmer. "Damn, My 
Skimmer. BlastRage take the skimmer back to base!!!" BH grabs onto
the 
skimmer. He fires an optic at Zardus as the skimmer turns around and 
heads back to Koga's Base. 

The skimmer autogun pops up as it the missles come towards the 
skimmer. It shoots all the missles blowing them up.

Blastrage pulls a hard left and watches as the laser's and bullet 
barley miss. A few hit, but the thick armor prevents any major
damage. 
Blastrage guns the Skimmer back to Koga's base. The Gernade Launcher 
fires 2 foleys of 10x missles. 1 at Oblitron and 1 at Radicon.
